Name: Of Fields Green: Clear Spring Fountain
Desc: A fountain that may be found within the garden known as "Of Fields Green." It is made of fine gray and white stone, and the water is icy and cool.\n"Of Fields Green" draws inspiration from fairy tale wonderlands. It is said that the fountains of Wonderland are capable of granting children confidence. Similarly, the well-placed sights of "Of Fields Green" can help guests rediscover their childlike souls.
Source: Purchased from Battle Pass: Gnostic Chorus
